meanings.definition: The state or quality of having a large, protruding belly.
meanings.sent1: His paunchiness made it difficult for him to bend over and tie his shoes.
meanings.sent2: The man's paunchiness was evident in his tight-fitting shirt.
meanings.sent3: Despite his paunchiness, he still managed to dance with grace at the party.
meanings.sent4: The paunchiness of the balloon made it float awkwardly in the air.
meanings.sent5: The paunchiness of the bear in the cartoon made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being overweight or having excess fat around the midsection.
meanings.sent1: Her paunchiness was a result of indulging in too many sweets.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his paunchiness.
meanings.sent3: Despite his paunchiness, he was still the fastest runner in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The paunchiness of the suitcase made it difficult to close.
meanings.sent5: The paunchiness of the cat made it look like it had eaten a whole fish.
